channel.title: Projects on Grant Rosson
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Grant Rosson

item.title: localauthor
item.description: Occasional short sketches on local fare and otherwise, offered freely.

item.title: poem-machine
item.description: Turning your favorite source text into the stock of your creations one random word at a time.

item.title: poem-machine-crawl
item.description: Wonder at the infinite crawl of the poem-machine. Currently Serving Up: Dickinson’s Poems (1890) Thoreau’s Journal Fuller’s Summer on the Lakes (1844) Some reports from the machine: https://localauthor.github.io/poem-machine-poems Or, visit the Github repository, to see the source code: https://github.com/localauthor/poem-machine-crawl

item.title: zk
item.description: An Emacs package for taking notes using the Zettelkasten method. Introduction and Key Features Demo of setup and basic features Demo of ‘Index’ and ‘Desktop’ interfaces
